name: townsquare-server
description: Blood on the Clocktower WebSocket Server

scripts.dev: lsof -ti:8001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && NODE_ENV=development bun --watch run index.js
scripts.dev:node: lsof -ti:8001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && NODE_ENV=development node --watch index.js
